name: oxygen
description: A bot that interfaces with Rust's Companion API

scripts.build: npm run build:json && npm run build:types
scripts.build:json: cd src/companion/protobuf && npx pbjs -t json-module -w commonjs -o bundle.js request.proto
scripts.build:types: cd src/companion/protobuf && npx pbjs -t static-module request.proto | pbts -o bundle.d.ts -

author: Diego Arias
